Ini Cara Keraton Kanoman Cirebon Maknai Maulid Nabi
07 Nov 2019, 14:21 by Sudirman Wamad


Ritual pencucian gong sekaten jelang perayaan Maulid Nabi di Cirebon (Sudirman Wamad/detikcom)

Cirebon - Keraton Kanoman Cirebon melaksanakan ritual pencucian gong sekaten jelang perayaan Maulid Nabi. Prosesi ritual dilakukan di langgar Keraton Kanoman Cirebon.Proses pengeluaran gong sekaten, seperangkat gamelan yang dikeramatkan dari Bangsal Pejimatan Keraton Kanoman Cirebon mengawali prosesi ritual. Rombongan abdi dalem membawa gong sekaten menuju langgar. Satu per satu gong keramat itu dicuci dengan air kembang.Proses pencucian diawali dengan penyiraman air kembang ke empat gong besar oleh keluarga keraton, kemudian diikuti dengan perangkat gemelan lain. Usai disiram menggunakan air kembang, seperangkat gamelan sekaten digosok menggunakan serabut kepala dan abu batu bata. Tujuannya agar gong tetap bersih.


(Sudirman Wamad/detikcom)

Juru bicara Keraton Kanoman Cirebon, Ratu Raja Arimbi Nurtina mengatakan, tradisi pencucian gong sekaten merupakan ritual tahunan yang dilakukan setiap tanggal 7 rabiulawal atau menjelang perayaan kelahiran nabi. "Sebelum gamelan ini dibunyikan dicuci terlebih dahulu. Bada Isya nanti gamelan dibunyikan hingga rangkaian maulid selesai," kata Arimbi kepada awak media di Keraton Kanoman, Kota Cirebon, Jawa Barat, Rabu (6/10/2019) kemarin. Lebih lanjut, Arimbi mengatakan kemunculan gamelan pusaka tersebut menjadi penanda bakal dilaksanakannya perayaan Maulid Nabi atau yang biasa disebut malam Pelal Panjang Jimat. "Nayaga akan memainkan gong sekaten ini di Bangsal Sekaten dengan diiringi selawat dan sahadat," kata Arimbi.


(Sudirman Wamad/detikcom)

Arim menerangkan tentang sejarah gamelan sekaten. "Gemalan sekaten ini hadiah yang diberikan oleh Raja Demak Bintoro ke III Sultan Trenggono ke Ratu Wulung Ayu, putri dari Sunan Gunung Jati dengan istrinya Nyimat Tepasari asal Majapahit," kata Arimbi.Saat itu, lanjut Arimbi, suami Ratu Wulung Ayu, Adipati Unus atau Pangeran Sabrang Lor yang juga menjabat sebagai Raja Demak ke II wafat. Kemudian, lanjut dia, gamelan pemberian Sultan Trenggono itu selalu dibunyikan setiap perayaan maulid."Pada saat Keraton terpecah menjadi dua Sultan, gamelan pusaka tersebut jatuh waris kepada Sultan Kanoman. Sampai sekarang masih dirawat dan dibunyikan saat maulid nabi, bentuk penghormatan kepada nabi," ucapnya.Selain itu, Arimbi juga menerangkan gamelan sekaten tersebut dijadikan media penyebaran agama Islam pada zaman dahulu. "Makna pencucian gamelan ini sebagai pembersihan, penyucian diri kita. Karena bagaimanapun kita harus mengharapkan berkah dari kanjeng nabi," tutupnya.Simak Video "Ke Cirebon, Jangan Lupa Jajal Bakso Legendaris Ini"[Gambas:Video 20detik](rdy/krs)

This is the Way of the Kanoman Palace in Cirebon Meaning the Prophet's Birthday
Nov 7 2019, 14:21 by Sudirman Wamad


The ritual of washing gong sekaten ahead of the celebration of the Prophet's Birthday in Cirebon (Sudirman Wamad / detikcom)

Cirebon - Cirebon Kanoman Palace performs the washing ritual of sekaten gongs ahead of the celebration of the Prophet's Birthday. The ritual procession was carried out at the Keraton Kanoman Cirebon langgar. The process of removing the sekaten gong, a set of gamelan which was saved from the Ward Hall of the Cirebon Kanoman Palace began the ritual procession. The courtiers entourage brought a sekaten gong to the langgar. One by one the sacred gong was washed with flower water. The washing process begins with watering the four large gongs by the royal family, then followed by other gurgling devices. After being flushed using developing water, a set of gamelan sekaten is rubbed using a head fiber and brick ash. The goal is to keep the gong clean.


(Sudirman Wamad / detikcom)

A spokesman for the Cirebon Kanoman Palace, Ratu Raja Arimbi Nurtina said, the tradition of washing the sekaten gong is an annual ritual which is carried out every 7 rabiulawal or before the celebration of the birth of the prophet. "Before the gamelan is sounded it is washed first. Bada Isya will be played until the maulid series is finished," Arimbi told media crews at the Kanoman Palace, Cirebon City, West Java, on Wednesday (6/10/2019) yesterday. Furthermore, Arimbi said that the emergence of the gamelan heirloom became a marker of the celebration of the Prophet's Birthday or commonly called the Pelal Panjang Amulet night. "Nayaga will play this sekong gong in the Sekaten Ward accompanied by celibates and sahadat," said Arimbi.


(Sudirman Wamad / detikcom)

Arim explained about the history of gamelan sekaten. "This secret gift is given by King Demak Bintoro III Sultan Trenggono to Ratu Wulung Ayu, daughter of Sunan Gunung Jati with his wife Nyimat Tepasari from Majapahit," said Arimbi. At that time, continued Arimbi, Ratu Wulung Ayu's husband, Duke Unus or Adipati Unus or Prince Sabrang Lor who also served as the King of Demak II died. Then, he continued, the gamelan given by Sultan Trenggono was always sounded every maulid celebration. "When the palace was split into two sultans, the inheritance gamelan was inherited to Sultan Kanoman. Until now it is still being treated and sounded during the prophet's birthday, a form of respect for the prophet," he said. In addition, Arimbi also explained that the sekaten gamelan was used as a media for the spread of Islam in ancient times. "The meaning of this gamelan washing as cleansing, purifying ourselves. Because after all we have to expect blessings from Kanjeng the prophet," he concluded.
